review_text: Good stay, clean with snacks. Very acutely aware of how you park.
Clean and comfortable with well-appointed kitchen.

Matt’s place was perfect for what we needed it for. He provided clear instructions for checking in and out. It was actually he easiest checkout I have ever had for an air b and b. He provided snacks, which were a life saver since we spent all day at an event. Would absolutely stay again.
great time. We enjoyed our stay. Matt was always concerned about our comfort and safety. Excellent communication. Highly recommended. We all loved it! 3 adults, 2 kids.

Great place to stay in the heart of Norwalk. We used Matt’s place as a landing place while in town for the Night Under Fire at Summit Raceway and it worked well. The home was very clean and had everything we needed.
Great place to stay

Matt was a great host. He had everything in place when we arrived. He quickly returned my calls. His instructions regarding the guesthouse were thorough. The home was impeccable at our arrival. Plenty of space for parking. He provided wonderful amenities. We enjoyed our stay.
We had a nice stay & appreciated the personal touches like a welcome note on the door. Steps were a bit tricky in this older home so not recommended for littles or seniors.

Matt & Erin's place was one of the nicest Airbnb's I've stayed at so far. Super clean bathroom and kitchen and lots of space to move around in a wonderful old building. Although I hadn't met our hosts, they were responsive and kind enough to leave snacks on the table and water in the fridge. I would come back in a heartbeat and would definitely recommend.
One of the nicer AirBnbs I've stayed at. Would come here again and would recommend to anyone looking to visit Cedar Point.

We had a great stay while visiting family in the area. The apartment was extremely clean and comfortable. We really appreciated the snacks, water and Beekman toiletries! Matt was extremely responsive and made sure we had everything we needed!
Took pride in this place. Very attentive and respectful. I loved the guest journal it made such a great addition to our trip.

Matt's house is very clean. We stayed for several days and the place was the cleanest Airbnb we have rented. All of the listing pics represent the house well. The TV and AC worked as they are supposed to. Water pressure was good and we had plenty of hot water. The beds were comfortable and the bedding was soft. We didn't notice any funny smells. Matt provided plenty of towels and also left snacks and water for us.
This was a great location and very comfortable place to stay.

Wonderful stay at the Grahams Station! Communication was fantastic! The house was very clean and convenient to the wedding we attended in Norwalk! Before the wedding we took pictures outside the beautiful Bed and Breakfast. We had beautiful backgrounds for our pictures! The flowers and yard was absolutely beautiful!
Thank you again for a wonderful place for my family to stay!
The place was clean and had plenty of room for my wife and I and our 2 teenage daughters . We visited Cedar Point during our stay and it was a short 30 minute drive north.
Such a clean nice “home away from home” place. Very comfortable. We would love to stay again and stay longer.
We enjoyed our stay. Helpful communication and check in was easy. Clean spaces with nice amenities for comfort.
Great place! Great hosts!

What a cute and comfortable get away. We did but spend a ton of time in the space because of the event we where in town for but the time we did spend was comfy and cozy. The amenities were perfect including the water and snacks left for us knowing we would be away in the heat all day. Thanks Matt, that was very thoughtful. We hope to be back next year.

We loved this Airbnb! So quaint, everything was perfect! Super clean, lovely decor, beds/couches/massage chairs very comfy! Great amenities including snacks and water. Matt and Erin are so nice! Location was fantastic, easy to get to our weekend destination- Summit Motorsports Raceway. We would definitely recommend this place to anyone, and hope to stay again next year!
Very nice 3 bedroom apartment. Very quiet and clean.
Enjoyed our time and everything was great

This is the cutest apartment and perfect for our sister trip. We each had our own bedroom and the bathroom was plenty big enough for us all to get ready. The is an extra mirror in the hallway that helped when we were in need. Kitchen is stocked well and we had a cute little welcome basket when we arrived. Only thing I’d share (and not a negative at all) is the apartment is above the garage and the stairs are very steep.
The place was super cute and quite and served us very well!

The guesthouse was a great cozy spot! We stayed with a friend and both our kids in order to take them to Cedar Point. It was exactly the home-base we needed, and the communication was excellent. We would stay again for sure.
This place was great. They had a care package waiting for us full of snacks and water. Very cute house ! We had a blast at this place!
Very cute cottage feel, host were great with communicating and giving recommendations.
Very nice apartment right on Main St among all the 19th century homes. Great area for a walk. Kitchen and bath were well stocked. No issues.
Very cute guest house. Very clean and felt homey. They were attentive and got you what ever you needed. Cute little massage chairs too. Would stay again!
We loved your air BnB! So many nice touches. We would definitely stay there again!
Matt's place was very clean, and had everything we needed. he communicated very well with us and I would definitely stay here again. highly recommend!
Roomy and private. Great location. Host was great. Highly recommend.

We had a fantastic stay. The guest house was absolutely perfect. Having some extra treats and waters immediately available to us was a lovely surprise and so appreciated after the long drive over.
We enjoyed being able to get in straight away, appreciated the quiet, and loved the overall vibe of the place. It is very well kept.
We will be booking again in the future when we come to visit family.
What a great weekend! Our second stay at this amazing location. Close to so many lake activities. We went to Put in Bay, local winery and shops! Can’t wait till our next weekend in Norwalk!

This was my first Airbnb experience and I absolutely loved the carriage house! The house was stocked with snacks on the kitchen table in a basket and waters in the fridge and the nightly price was amazing for all the room and privacy here.
We all loved the massage chairs, especially after a long day walking around Cedar Point amusement park and the electric fireplace was a nice touch too. The home was so clean, updated and the bedrooms were very comfortable and cute! The yard has a couple tables and chairs and the neighborhood is quiet and peaceful.
The hosts checked in daily and were very accommodating. We also got a nice welcome note from them. I highly recommend this rental.
Matt was a very kind and clear host. The living space was accommodating and was exactly what my group was looking for on a weekend out. I’ll keep this place in mind for future stays!

Very accurate description actually the pictures do know justice the house is very beautiful in person it made me not want to go to amusement park I wish I could’ve just stayed there and relax definitely will keep this place in mind for a getaway
Great location in a neat historic area. Host was very responsive to requests. Very clean and stocked with everything we needed. Ample room for 4 adults and 2 kids in our party.
Wonderful place to stay, such a cute area with nice places to eat and visit. Not too far from Cedar Point.
What a wonderful place - spotless and modern inside in an amazing district of historical homes. Thank you!

This was a great place to stay for our trip to Cedar Point! Very nice, clean, and welcoming. It has everything you could need for a group of 6! They checked in on us frequently and made our stay memorable! The massage chairs after an open to close day at the park was perfection!

An absolute gem! Historic cozy with modern amenities! Our family of 5 absolutely loved our stay! Spacious common areas, comfortable beds, good location, reliable WiFi, simple temperature control… The ceiling fans & massage chairs were great perks! Communication with the home owner was wonderful! Highly recommend!!
Not large bedroom but everything is great. A house in a beautiful garden. A garden in beautiful town. Also all the rooms are comfortble. Very nice！

We were unable to make our reservation due to a medical emergency. Matt & Erin were quick to respond and were extremely understanding. They worked with us when we needed to cancel and we are planning to stay with them sometime in the future. I cannot express how wonderful they were as we dealt with a tough situation.

Very very very clean! As soon as we walked in the smell of freshness was great. The snacks, coffee and water was a very nice touch. Bathroom had many shampoo/soap options just in case you need them. Great place to stay definitely will be back.
Highly recommend! So communicative and generous and friendly. We had a fantastic stay!!

Nice, comfortable, and affordable place to stay. Good location, restaurants and more all within a few miles of the place. The 3 bedrooms are comfortable. Although we only used 2. The kitchen is very well-equipped. Sofa is a bit small but can fit two people in a pinch. We would stay here again and most definitely recommend for other guests.

The Graham Station House is a wonderful place to stay when traveling through northern Ohio. If you have an appreciation for quaint housing, personal space and privacy, then this is the place for you! My family and I plan to return and stay here again & again when we travel to visit family and friends! Not to mention, the hosts, Matt & Erin, are very friendly, courteous people. We're looking forward to our next visit and stay.

Helpful communication in all
Aspects of our stay.
Wonderful stay to visit family - Matt and Erin were extremely helpful and communicative. Very comfortable and clean home.

Oh my, we couldn’t have asked for a better back to school weekend for our teen daughters and friends! They girls stayed in the carriage house and the moms in the B&B on the same property. We were greeted with a tour, snacks, recommendations for dinner and activities on the lake! The apartment was sparkly clean and had everything we needed to cook! Loved the coffee station😊 We are finding a date to come back for our Fall girls birthday celebration!!!
Great place, close to downtown Norwalk and Sandusky attractions

Very nice place ! It was very quiet. The owners responded very quickly to our questions. It is within driving distance of the beaches and Cedar Point. The place was exactly what we needed. It was a very pleasant experience !
Clean and nice place. Really quick response.
We had a great stay at the house! Everything was clean and had a full kitchen. Thanks for hosting us!
Adorable place with lots of nice touches. Beautiful historic neighborhood.

We had such an enjoyable time in Matt's place. The space was relaxing, beautifully decorated and had such nice welcoming touches. We enjoyed that we could take a very short walk (about 10 minutes) to the town down a street filled with historic houses. Thank you for being such a great host!

The home is very nice & clean w/ AC in every room. They left us a customized note welcoming my family & I which I thought was very thoughtful/nice of them & a cute basket w/ snacks in the kitchen. It was a very relaxing vibe, we definitely enjoyed our stay in this home.

It was a pleasure to be the first person to book with Matt & Erin.
Me and my family enjoyed our time. For us to be the first family To stay was a pleasure.Quick responses and very thoughtful touches they made for my sisters birthday Special 😊Goodluck Matt & Erin you all will do great in this business. With some extra touches you guys are gonna have a spectacular place! Thanks for everything.Until next time 😊
Columbus,Ohio
Very nice place to stay in and very commutative.
There's no thermostat. Very inconvenient to contact the host to change the temperature or even see the temperature. Folks in the other unit in the duplex were loud.

This unit is in a great location in Norwalk. It’s close to restaurants and shopping. Adequate parking and easy access inside with a keypad. Steve gave good instructions and was attentive when I messaged him about the temperature inside the unit. The bathroom is large.
Great spot to stay
We came to Norwalk for the eclipse. Nice back yard to hang out and view it. The place was comfortable and clean!
Steve was a great host! The home was perfect for our needs for the night, and we had ample space along with a very clean living space! Highly recommend!
Great host, very communicative! Clean and cozy home.
Comfy quit only problem is he controls the heat so it got a lil toasty at night time other then that great place would recommend
This is my second time staying, always a five star experience all across the board.
Steves place was great and exactly what I needed. Great experience all the way around.
Had a wonderful stay at Steve’s place. He was very responsive to questions from the beginning to end of our stay. We will be back to stay again!

Steve was nice and accommodating.
Unhappily though house was disappointingly dirty and was my second worst bnb stay in ten years.
I am particular about things feeling clean. There was mouse dirt along the baseboards in the bedrooms, bathroom, and laundryroom, which we vacuumed. There were no plates, a cracked glass was in the cupboard and the cupboards were sticky, we had wash everything before using it. Thankfully there was a washer and dryer because the comforter on the bed had food stuck on it, and chips and crumbs fell out of the extra blanket on the couch. We washed everything before using it.
As a super host myself, I know rodent and pest control can be a challenge but the lack of cleanliness made it feel like no real effort is being made to make guests comfortable.
If you need a place to stay, the house was in a nice neighborhood and Steve was nice, just bring your own bedding and prepare to do some cleaning or be willing to overlook some dirt.

This cute little place was perfect for what we needed. We were visiting family for the holidays. Traveled with 4 bigger kids and 2 infants. There was ample bed space and a decent sized kitchen. Steve was very responsive any time I needed something. Check in and check out was very simple. We felt very safe in this neighborhood and any shopping or food you may want is very close by. We would stay again. If I had to give the place a downfall, I would say it's not having temperature control in the unit, we were a little chilly, but I just put the kids in warm jammies and have them blankets.
This was a great Airbnb to stay at. Everything was exactly as stated in the description! The host was awesome and very responsive I would definitely book Steve’s home again!
Very nice clean comfortable home away from home
Clean and comfy, perfect for a little drive to cedar point
Clean and very kind host
Love the stay very nice and comfortable
Great location. Five minutes from the wedding I attended
We stayed here while visiting the Racetrack which was super close by. House was right between restaurants and racetrack and very convenient.

Steve was extremely friendly and responsive throughout the whole stay! Very clean and spacious living room and kitchen area for a big group. We stayed as a group of 6 college students, we had plenty of room to cook and relax after a busy day at Cedar Point (30 minutes away). There were cooking utensils and silverware as well as towels in the bathroom. Everything was clean. Would definitely recommend!
Great host! Fair location but got the job done.
Went to cedar point for the day and it was the perfect place to stay at for the night after a long day.
5 stars fasho

As described
This was a great value for a place to sleep off the excitement of Cedar Point. It worked well for the family, nice amenities that a hotel wouldn’t have.
Super clean, updated older home.
Awesome place, spacious living room to spread out, comfy beds
Great place for a quick stay over. Very roomy and clean. Easy access and the host is very responsive. Would definitely stay again.
Great place to stay near cedar point
We stayed here for a dance competition at Kalahari. Steve’s home was super convenient for us.
Steve was very responsive, check in was easy and the location was very close to downtown
Everything was great!
Had a wonderful stay! Location was great for many things to do in the area, and just enough off the main road that passing-by traffic wasn't a noise issue.
Was very clean and homely
Nice quiet place to stay, host is very nice :-) I requested some improvements in cleaning under the bed and the bathroom. I’m sure that everything will be taken care of. Thank you :-)
Great stay
House was perfect to stay the night in for work
We have stayed at Steve’s locations multiple times because he’s such a great host and has clean, beautiful places to stay!
Perfect place to stay for the night! The check-in was easy and Steve communicated very well and fast. The place itself was really nice. Can’t wait to book again!

My daughter and I had a great stay here while in town for travel ball. Steve was very responsive and helpful. Place was clean and had everything we needed. Located in a cute neighborhood conveniently located near CVS, Walmart, multiple restaurants and the sports center. I will definitely book again if traveling in the area.

Place was really clean & easy, just what we needed…
Bathroom & shower was nice & spacious, great towels as well!
Steve’s place was clean and comfortable and exactly as I expected. Steve responded quickly to fix a minor plumbing issue. I would definitely stay there again when I return to Norwalk.
Steve was very nice we booked the wrong cabin and he was able to get us the one we needed. The place was clean and stocked
Great place to stay on our way out east. Thanks, Steve!
Love the house
We had a lovely last minute stay here! The towels were super soft and it was equipped with everything we needed.
Great rental. Would stay again.
Easy to find nice neighborhood very convenient
he is a awesome caring person
We stayed here while we attended a cheer competition at Kalahari. Easy to find the residence and super close to Kalahari.
Perfect location cvs nearby and khalahari 15 min away perfect for a weekend stay
Perfect place to stop for a brief stay during a road trip. Would stay again.
Was for one night Cedar Point stay! Cozy! Thanks Steve!! Communication excellent throughout!!
Such a beautiful place to stay and really close to everything!
Great great rate for what you get. Very spacious and clean!
My guests and I were in town for an event so we only slept and showered there. The place served it’s purpose well.
We only stayed one night but it was close to the area we needed. The house was clean and it was everything the description had indicated.

We had 5 total in our party and the sofa bed didn’t have its own linens, I had one sleep on the blanket provided, but for the cost and that it’s advertised as being useful for those visiting parks 1/2 an hour away it seemed a fourth set of sheets and maybe a pillow was warranted.
Very clean , close to Ohio Turnpike, a little distance to Cedar Point. Neighborhood’s quit , very dark and standard. Steve is great at responding to your text.

The unit was nicely furnished, however, it would have been helpful if the post informed us we would not be able to control the air or heat. When we informed the host we were cold, he informed us there was no thermostat and never resolved our issue. We used the oven to warm the unit as it was unseasonably cold. There were also areas such as the door (covered with grime), trash can (lid was covered with food drippings) and light switches which were dirty. The lack of a curtain or shade on the front door that had a large window was a concern for us and we made a makeshift one with a towel. The owner was gracious enough to allow us a late check out, but unfortunately forgot until we provided screenshots of the correspondence. We didn't have an awful experience, but it wasn't what we expected.
Great stay good communication!
John’s how was exactly as described.
Good place to stay. Enjoyed the location. Sweet little place.

John was rude and his home did not smell the best and wasn’t clean to my expectations of renting a home. Also, the bathroom is a see through door with no privacy and he was unresponsive and inconsiderate about giving a refund due to his poor service . I don’t recommend . If I could post pictures on here, I would show for proof .
John’s place was very clean. I truly enjoyed the peace and quiet. The location was perfect. Thanks John for a relaxing weekend.
Another great stay at one of John’s places ! Great communication! It has everything you need. That bed is SO comfortable! Very happy with his place. Highly recommend.
nice quaint place, exactly what i needed while i stayed the night on a quick business trip

Another good stay at John’s place. Only issue this time was the wash machine leaked while running a load. He seemed to know it was an issue but the problem wasn’t noted in the ad. That was the only issue. I still feel the place is a good value, it’s a whole house for a minimal cost, and would stay again.

My husband & I enjoyed John’s place! The area was very quiet and peaceful. It was clean and just enough for our little family. Ideal if you are traveling alone, with your significant other or a few friends. Small and cozy. Minutes away from shopping outlets, Kalahari & Cedar point, and various food places. Check in/out was easy and seamless. I wouldn’t mind staying in John’s place again! I definitely recommend checking it out!
Nice for a couple to stay in
Very clean and quite would love to book again :)
perfect one person house for travlers on the go.

This place was perfect for me and my travel needs. It was clean and had all of the amenities I needed. The neighborhood is very quiet, felt safe, and it was easy to find. I had a great stay and would definitely recommend!
Great location. Easy access and great price. We are repeat customers for our long distance drives!
A pleasant place to stay. Good location halfway between the Midwest and east coast.
I would highly recommend this AIRBNB very cheap and affordable, real clean and tidy , airbnb host was fast responding respectful & helpful
Great place to make a quick stop on a long road trip. We had the dishes we needed to finish leftovers, Netflix with Ghibli movies, a soft, warm blanket and coffee with accompaniments in the morning.
Was a nice little home, good price for a night :)

Clean, nice place to stay overnight.
Enjoyed the stayed. No problems during our stay. Thanks
Nice place
John's place was just the right amount for our quick stop during a long trip. Self check-in made our late entry, early exit smooth and convenient.
As advertised

Traveling to Sandusky Ohio for a weekend of fun at Kalahari, decided to spent a night the day before after traveling. Chose to stay at John's place with my wife and toddler, found the space perfect for our needs and had the essentials we needed for our stay provided. Very close proximity to everything you could need, would absolutely stay again in the future.
Thanks for great stay
Great value and another great stay in Norwalk!

John was super quick in his communication and made our last-minute stay very seamless. Cleanliness was 4.6 out of 5 stars, but all in all it was a good place for us to stay the night on our trip. That’s all we needed. Location is very decent for traveling across I-80/90 and even closer to US-20.
Perfect for our needs.

It was a great experience. Nice place to stay in a nice location.

Great little 1 bed room house. Perfect for a couples trip to cedar point!

The place is not bad overall, but it probably should not be listed for 4 people. Our children are teens and the pull-out couch is not quite what I expected for a pull-out couch. If you have 2 toddlers or are just a couple looking for a place for a few days it would be fine.
Bathroom doesn't have much privacy either, slotted folding door and right off the living room and bedroom so if you're doing your business everyone will know. Again, for just a couple probably not a big deal.
Overall it's a decent place and pretty well maintained, just didn't work for a family of 4 with 2 teens. John did accept a refund request for the second night that was enough to get a room at the local holiday inn express.
Easy to find, clean and a great pit stop after the races.
Suited our needs for the weekend! Thanks!
Is just what I needed a simple place for a few days. Gelt cozy. Unassuming Great restaurant literally steps away across the street. Very nice. Would stay again
This spot was close to everything we needed to be at and the host was very responsive!
John was an amazing host, he responded very quickly. I would stay again and recommend anyone to stay there.

Easy check in. We noticed the bed sheets were dirty with short dog hair, and the pillow cases looked dirty. I notified John and he called me right away. He stated his cleaning crew are excellent but would offer to have sheets brought to us or we could wash our own and he would refund our cleaning fee. We decided to wash our own. We also noticed there was no dish towel to dry our dishes, only paper towels which was a limited amount. There were no salt and pepper to cook with or a large mixing bowl for making scrambled eggs.
John did refund our cleaning fee. For being a small cottage, it worked for our trip to Cedar Point.
Cute smaller rental. Perfect for our quick stop while passing through.
Great place to stay!
Perfect place to stay after the races
Thanks for the stay! Had a great time and great location, close to the track

John was fantastic as a host! He was extremely responsive and even had his team bring us an additional sheet set and towels within a half hour.
The place was really cute. We had a family of four. I personally think the space would be best for a family of two, as the couch wasn't the most comfortable for two.
The grass was a bit overgrown, so we couldn't get out and play in the backyard. I also didn't see any corn hole boards or chairs in the back, which I thought was in the description.
All in all, the house was great! It was really convenient and located close enough to all the festivities. It came in handy for us.
I would recommend this house.
John was a responsive host and the property was perfect for the weekend
John was super responsive for a last minute stay! It was easy to find and check in. The place was perfect for my travel needs.
Host is VERY responsive with communication. The place is adorable, clean, quiet and the perfect place to stay for a couple to stay. Definitely would rent again!!
very nice host, very beautiful place the backyard was something else entirely, absolutely breathtaking trees, it’s so cozy and wonderful
Perfect place to stay during a Cedar Point trip. The bed was very comfy and our son slept well on the pull out couch. Kitchen and bathroom had everything we needed to feel right at home.
Kitchen well-stocked and host responsive. Was great to have AC.
Jon is a great host. Place is a little small
Second time staying and was as good as the first. Yes it’s a small space, but yes it is a great value and has everything you need for a good stay!
Great host
I would absolutely stay here aging.

John was a responsive host. The house does have a musty smell that hits you when you walk in the door, and the standing water from outside may have permeated the floors inside as they felt wet as well.

It’s a tiny home! It’s so adorable. I would guess it was just built. It’s well laid out. Perfect for a couple or small family. John is super responsive… matter of minutes or even seconds. I asked a question and put the phone down. He responded and then called when I didn’t respond right away just to make sure I was taken care of. I would stay here before any 5 star hotel.
Quick night stay, it was a nice little place
Good place to stay 20 minutes away from Kalahari which is where we were visiting. Only stayed for two nights and it was great 👍🏼

John’s place was a bargain. Sure it wasn’t big, but it was a private place all to yourself! Probably the only con was it seemed like the auto function on the heater didn’t work well to keep the whole house warm. Note that there is just a wall mounted a/c and heater so if you’re staying in summer it may get a bit warm in the bedroom. But again, it was definitely a bargain for having your own place and I would stay there again.
Great place!
Very cozy place it was a a great place to just get away for a few days very relaxing
Great host and great place.

my husband and I visited kalahari and decided to stay at John's place instead of the kalahari resort.
perfect location, the house was cozy just like the pictures. easy check-in. John was very responsive, he answered us soon after messaging.
we will definitely be choosing this place when we are in town again.
It was great! John was very accommodating on short notice.
I love the privacy and it was clean and just I needed to get away the host was very responsive and nice thank you

This is a nice place to stay. Very cozy and clean. Only thing i would mention is to bring your own pillows as the ones there were on the flat side. Over all we enjoyed our stay and would stay here again.
This was a great weekend getaway place. Place was perfect for two of us. Spotless too. John was easy to get in touch with for any questions. Would definitely stay again.

John's place is a great find for the price. The apartment is simple and adequate for 3, it would be a tight fit with 4. Everything worked and was as described online. Check in/out was simple and easy.
John was a fantastic host. Very responsive and easy to communicate with. Super friendly and flexible. Would definitely recommend if you’re looking for a remote, quaint place to stay.
Cute little cabin, nice and clean.

Easy check in, great communication, & very cute place in the perfect location!
John was extremely helpful for this last-minute booking. Would definitely stay again!
Great!
Really cute place and close to a lot of things. Perfect stay!

The owner was kind and very responsive, and the place was relatively clean with a smart tv in the living space as well as the bedroom.
However, this space is not what was expected. From the description and photos on the listing, it appears that it is a house in a relatively secluded area with lots of open room (outdoors and indoors), but that was not the case. The place is more like an in-laws suite, and was on the same lot as another house, meaning it was basically smashed in between two houses. Additionally, the bathroom didn’t have a real door on it. It was just an accordion style closet door, so there’s limited to no privacy.
Clean , cozy and comfortable. I really liked it. I will visit again next year. The area was nice quiet. However we can in late and only stayed the night but all went well😁

Delighted to find this comfy, cozy, dog-friendly place to call home for a few days! Easy access, easy parking, quiet neighborhood. There’s a train beyond the woods but I think I only heard it once. Smart TVs, so I could “cast” from my devices. All the amenities I could want. Thanks a bunch, I hope to be back!
Worth the money! Cute and has all the essentials

There was a wasp infestation when we arrived late in the evening with our two children. It was a dismal situation and a difficult night. We ended up staying less than seven hours. John's solution of having us leave the place at 11:00pm was unattainable as our children were exhausted after a day of driving and were already asleep. There was also hair in the shower. I didn't even ask for a full refund just a token of recognition for how difficult this was for us and he would not accept that responsibility. I ended up calling Airbnb and they assisted me with a partial refund and also told me what to do incases like this.
So if you ever find yourself in an airbnb place that feels:
Unsafe
Unclean
Has a pest problem
Or does not meet with your understanding of the description
You should document it with photo's and a video and leave immediately, contact the host and airbnb as soon as possible and get a hotel if no other solution is found.
I love small places and enjoyed all the airbnb we have stayed in on this trip but this was a real let down.

Great place to stay if road-tripping with your pup! This comfy little house is well-appointed with everything you need for a night or a few—I was very impressed with the kitchen especially! The backyard is a great quiet place to play with your dog and potty them, especially if your dog has a bad habit of getting distracted by anything and everything (like mine does). The bed was SUPER comfy. John’s responses to messages were nearly instantaneous and we so appreciated how easy he made booking/checking in. We will definitely book again!
Great little place with everything we needed. We had a great time!
Great, cozy place! Easy to find. John, is a great host! Would recommend! Such a cute little place!
Cute place. Well stocked kitchen. Quality bath towels, nice pillows. Initially I was concerned about the neighborhood however it was a quiet area and we were able to rest well at night.

The Airbnb was perfect for our trip to Kalahari and Cedar Point. It is cozy, clean, and comfortable. We had 4 people stay, two slept on the pull out couch (which was comfy) and 2 slept in the bedroom. No complaints here and the host was always quick to reply.

The most noticeable thing about this listing is the size. For the price, I feel like the listing and the amenities offered were absolutely not worth it. The bathroom was okay but the door isnt a "real" door so there is really no privacy when using the restroom and the shower was so small that it was uncomfortably cramped. The floors had crumbs all over and the rug that was definitely supposed to be white was a grayish color from not being cleaned in so long. Luckily we brought our own sheets and blankets because there was a gross white stain on the blanket. And the bedroom was incredibly small - you cant even open or shut the door properly. The host was very nice and communucated well, but offered to let us check out 3 hours late at a rate of $20/hour if we left cash on the counter, which he texted me about rather than message me on Airbnb since thats not allowed. Definitely would not stay again unless the price was maybe half. I've paid way less for much nicer listings.
A cozy and clean place to stay. John’s communication was excellent. Check-in and check-out was great and easy to do.

Our stay was great! Was the perfect size for my boyfriend and I for a 2 night stay! Close to a few restaurants and grocery stores! The unit was very clean and organized and the host was very easy to communicate with!
Great place. We both enjoyed our stay. It was clean and comfortable, so overall we were happy with our stay and would recommend it.
Super cute place! Comfortable and well kept 😊 ac worked great! Hot water for the shower and nice water pressure. Best for 2 people but 3 or 4 could work on couch/bed
A great last minute stay after cedar point! Very helpful and responsive.
Great stay !
Very clean and updated place. John was quick to respond and very informative. The place is very clean and relaxing. Loved sitting in the back in the evening watching the fireflies.

My stay was great! The location was perfect for the events we were going to and it was very cute and clean! The host was very kind and communication was great! Answered all of my questions. It was much appreciated!
A nice cozy space and the perfect landing pad for a convention. Hope you don't mind train horns.

If I could give a 10/10 on any Airbnb listing, it would be this one. We walked in as guests & left feeling like family.
As soon as we arrived, Annette gave us a lovely tour of her beautiful home. She welcomed us with a contagious smile and such a friendly personality. She cooked us lovley breakfasts every morning and we spent hours chatting about traveling, food, life & other fun topics!
Annette’s Airbnb smelled wonderful, its was pristinely clean, and her two kitties Luna & Evie were so loving and friendly. She was extremely quick to respond, gave amazing restaurant recommendations, & went above & beyond to provide dairy free options at breakfast.
If you are looking for a safe, clean, warm & delightful place to rest your head, I highly doubt I can recommend a better place. Thank you for being so welcoming to us Annette, thank you for all of your kindness.
We will absolutely come back & look forward to it! Give Luna & Evie some pets for us until then! <3
Great stay, Anette was a wonderful host who went above and beyond to make me feel welcomed.

Annette was so sweet and friendly, she thought of everything you could possibly need and put it in her home for you. For example, she had a little go box of stuff in case you forgot something from home and a counter with snacks. The breakfasts she provided were homemade and so yummy. Her home is beautiful like a farmhouse theme. Provided comfy blankets and bedding. Everything was so clean and organized. Thank you for your amazing hospitality! She also gave me traveling tips to other countries and states! Thank you again for everything! I would stay here again 100%.

Annette is super friendly and her home is absolutely beautiful. She did a great job modernizing the old house and turning it into her home. Every morning she makes a different breakfast at the time of your choosing and she never disappointed. Annette is big into “farm to table” and try’s hard to show that in her meals. With farm fresh eggs, to sausage links from a butcher, and an assortment of jams that were made fresh. As stated previously Annette is super friendly and we had a lot in common. Every morning we talked for an hour over breakfast. Her friendliness is obviously contagious because her cats Luna and Evee were also friendly and just wanted to be petted and cuddle. Annette also had access to different streaming services like Netflix, HBO Max, and Amazon Prime if you just wanted to relax with watching something after a long day. And go ahead and ask her for recommendations because she has some great ones. Even a show that I will be watching at home now. I highly recommend 10/10

Absolutely phenomenal. Annette went above and beyond to make sure to make me feel at home and always made sure I was comfortable. Whatever supplies I needed, she had. Communication was very timely, clear, and concise. Never once felt unsafe nor stressed here - in fact, being an anxious person myself, I found myself quite calm and relaxed while staying here. Wholly the definition of vacation! I would absolutely stay again!

Came to Norwalk for the solar eclipse. Had a fantastic time staying with Annette as well! Very friendly, gave lots of good, local advice, and had a nice clean house.
She made great breakfasts with fresh ingredients and even offered dinner one night since the restaurants in town were expected to be full. Knew the best spot to watch the eclipse as well.
Norwalk is a nice small town. Some good restaurants within walking distance.

My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Turned out we had lots more in common with Annette than we expected. The house has been very tastefully and conveniently remodeled; very comfortable--hey, we even enjoyed for the first time picking our favorite tunes with Alexa! We look forward to returning (s0 we can visit our middle son who lives near by).
It was lovely staying with Annette! Her house was welcoming and the cats were super friendly. If I ever comeback to Ohio I would love to stay with her again!
Perfect in every way....charming room and house, delicious breakfast, Annette is both personable and discrete. Near Edison birthplace and the Osborn Metro Park for Saturday parkruns.
Annette is a fabulous host. Her house is very clean and organized. She prepared a great breakfast. Annette is very kind and helpful.
The hostess was very welcoming as well as accommodating. I really loved the décor design and the interior was beautiful. I will definitely stay here again!

We loved our time here. Just great fun with all of our older children who took advantage of the fishing, kayaking, and hot tub and just spent entire weekend outside and really enjoyed it. This is our 2nd time renting the same cabin. Middle of nowhere but right around the corner from everything you need.
It was wonderful!
What a great little spot. The lake is beautiful with fantastic fishing. We really enjoyed the sunsets and grilling out back. The hot tub was also a great touch. Would definitely come back.

Very nice place, enjoyed the extra firewood and early check in time. Thanks so much!

This place is insanely beautiful. The cabin is lovely and brand new. The lake it’s on is so beautiful, and hanging out in the hot tub was a highlight for us. this is beautiful place!! 😍 we didn't use the hottub but it was a nice feature! as soon as we got there we felt cozy and relaxed! place was clean and had everything we needed! deff would love to return here some day!

Our family of 10 very much enjoyed our stay at the cabin. We walked in the woods. Drove to nearby towns. Played games and relaxed inside. One of the best places we stayed. Very peaceful and my family love every moment over there. You forget about all your problems when you’re there looking to the lake. Thanks for everything we can’t wait to go back on Summer.

Great place
Nice place, would come back.

It was a grand old time

5 stars - would stay here again and would recommend. Really beautiful well built cabin.

I’m not sure what that was. It was December and cold, so we were not outside much.
Positives: Beautiful cabin. Beds are comfortable. There is sufficient storage (empty dressers, drawers all around bed, lots of coat hooks). Some basics (olive oil; S&P; lots of pans: coffee and filters). There is a small shampoo, soap, etc. provided, but I would recommend bringing your own. Hot tub was a nice feature (there was some sand in it from previous guests). Upstairs is a fun getaway for children. I would say ~5 kids could probably sleep up there. Watch your head on the wood beam from the top bunk though! Lots of games too!

A wonderful and beautiful retreat…snuggled in a quiet place that is near to everything….the cabin was beautiful and well appointed with all of the amenities…with a soothing and relaxing view of the lake….near by to Norwalk for restaurants, shops and grocery store even though it feels worlds away….the host was very communicative and most accommodating….we will most definitely be returning…this weekend was a very special weekend for us and this was the perfect place to spend it…

Had an excellent stay at the house. My three kids loved it and took advantage of the fishing and kayaking. Everything was clean, comfortable, and well maintained. Me and my family had a great time!

I was concerned that one bathroom would be a problem but it was not - not a single emergency occurred 😊 We found the people in the community to be very friendly. There is a nice park a few minutes away. It was equipped with plenty to do for all of the ages in our group. They enjoyed playing basketball with new friends and the youth wore their uncle out! Would recommend for sure.
This is a 5 star place! Very relaxing and peaceful setting, beautiful views, fishing was great, nice trails to walk on. The cabin is clean and spacious, everything worked perfect.

I would recommend this cabin to anyone. It was super clean, secluded but still close to restaurants, & everything is very well kept. Such a beautiful place and stay! Larry was a great communicator. Enjoyed our time immensely!

The access road to the tiny home passes by the cabin so between people coming and going, the noise from the party and the fact that it was close enough with no trees or anything to block the view (we could see/hear them, they could see us in the hot tub, at the fire pit etc) it seems a bit over priced for how secluded the listing makes it sound. With all the rules they have in place for noise and parties it would have at least been nice to have been given a heads up about the tiny home and the gathering there.

Wow! Beautiful! We loved staying here. Very clean, comfortable, cozy, and quiet. We booked the cabin for a little getaway with our 3 young children . The only recommendation I can give for cleanliness is the hot tub . We found some debris settled in the bottom upon our first attempt to get in. Patrick was great to work with and the home was lovely and clean. They even dropped off a fresh set of towels part way through our stay.
We loved our stay here! Milan is walking distance and such a neat little town! We will be back!
Great place to stay! Had nice personal touches. Comfortable beds. Clean. Beautiful yard and patio.
This place is nice and quiet. It is an older house, but is updated to feel more modern. It holds a lot of history and is nice to see how it’s preserved. It is a cozy place that feels like home.

Plenty of room for family of five, home very clean and decorated well. Very quiet and relaxing, bed are so very comfy!!!!
Patrick response time is within 30 mins! Very impressed!!!

We stayed here as a family of 8 traveling to Cedar Point and it was very spacious and suited all of our needs. It was nestled in the woods but yet still close to several shops/things do do. We were even able to visit Thomas Edison’s birthplace which was just around the corner from this home. Additionally, this host went above and beyond for us when inquiring about a crockpot, they went out and purchased this for us. Finally we loved the huge canvas available near the dining area for guests to sign. We enjoyed our stay here!

Super cute and great location! We stayed for a trip to Cedar Point, and it was decently close to the park. Very private and a lot of space for everyone. If we ever go out again to the park again, this would be our first choice of places to stay. Being able to see the fireflies at night was so nice, and the restaurants recommended were great. We also really liked how cozy and clean everything was. Patrick was great and very responsive, 10/10!

From the moment you walk in the door it was clear that the host wants you to feel welcome and well taken care of. We booked this location because of its proximity to Ironman 70.3 Sandusky. It was a peaceful environment to come back to and relax after the race. Just a 20 minute drive from downtown Sandusky. Plenty of space to relax on the large outdoor deck surrounded by woods on the back side of the house.
We had an amazing time staying here. Thank you so much.

We absolutely loved our stay at this beautiful cottage. Our host was incredibly welcoming and left a very nice birthday message for my son which we absolutely loved. The privacy and flexibility was 10/10. The charm and beauty was 10/10. The overall experience was 10/10. This place was everything we needed while traveling in a group of 4, 2 adults and two teenagers. Very close to Cedar Point and tons of other attractions.
The host was fantastic and super easy to work with. The space is exactly like the photos listed and it was a super cute and a cool cottage!

we absolutely loved our stay here! very easy to find, and while it is close to many attractions, it is very quiet and peaceful at the house. very clean, and there were many useful amenities available. would love to stay again 😊
This was a great place to stay. We were close to everything we wanted to do. The house was very quiet and relaxing while we were there. Hopefully we can stay there again next year.
Patrick is a great host. The house is adorable.

This place was very lovely! My daughter plays travel softball and they had a tournament at Sandusky and I booked this home for my daughter, her dad, their head coach and wife and their 2 kids. They had a wonderful time! Very cozy, amenities were great. Patrick was amazing from beginning to end. Very good communication. I would stay here again!
This was a wonderful place to stay with a lot of charm. Very convenient location and great for a group or family stay.

Cute old home with fun vibrant design & fitting nod to Thomas Edison! Smaller in size but space was designed well to maximize use & plenty of space for a family of 5 adults to relax in multiple areas inside & out. Note: lower ceilings on second floor.
Beautiful yard with huge trees & nature to relax in peaceful setting.

My mom and I stayed here for a Mother’s Day weekend away. It was perfect for our needs. We’re home bodies and were able to stay in and cross stitch to our hearts content! The eclectic feel and aesthetic was perfect. Great old charm with so many modern upgrades.
This cottage is absolutely beautiful and so cozy! Clean place, the decor is also really unique and most importantly, Patrick is really amazing. 100/10 recommend!!!
Beautiful historic home with decor and location to match. My family and I had a great stay, plenty of open space for children to play.

The cottage was beautifully decorated, perfect and private. We had a great weekend and felt at home. Patrick was a great host and responsive to all requests! There was coffee available as well as water and snacks. Truly an amazing place to stay and would have loved to had a longer time in the cottage. Check in was a breeze. Loved everything about this place and would definitely come back!
Great host and even better place!

We had a great stay at Patrick’s house. It was a cold weekend but the heaters and space heaters kept us warm. House has great charm and fun games and puzzles as well. Has everything you need and lots of seating and hanging out space. Perfect location for our group of 5.
Cool place, just 3 of us but plenty of room for many more. Unique interior, fun. Lots of room outside, quiet, and private.

A lovely spot! Exactly as described, beautifully decorated, great size, and perfect for kids (and adults!). Patrick gave a heads up that it was cold upstairs in the winter, and it definitely was! The space heater was a great help. The town nearby is cute, it’s a great price. Don’t pass this one up!
Great stay! Exactly as pictured with thoughtful touches.

A fantastic getaway! Patrick's place was exactly what we wanted and needed for our trip. Everything is exactly as pictured and described, and so much more! It is such a well decorated and cozy place with all the right touches to make you feel right at home. My biggest wish is that we could have stayed longer! Definitely will be coming back in the future!

A wonderful, relaxing stay! Clean, beautiful cottage! Stocked well with dishes, coffee, blankets, games. Plenty of sleeping arrangements. Close to restraunts. Very cute historic town! Would definitely love to stay again! Only things that may have made it a tad better would be a hot tub, 2nd tv & a blue tooth speaker for playing music. Thanks for a great stay!
Enjoyed the stay!!

This was a very cute house with cute decor and great amenities. Our group was comfortably accommodated and had plenty of room to hang out and play games. Patrick was quick and responsive to any communications. We wouldn’t hesitate to stay at any of his properties in the future.
This place was so cute!

Just perfect for what we needed! 2 families with 2 dogs. Patrick is a great host who communicated very well and very quickly replaced a special light bulb that had burnt out in the bathroom. Only negative is that we were not able to fully enjoy the cottage and the surroundings as we were there for a wedding. Definitely on our “do again list”!

Patrick's home is very cozy! The fact that it is pet friendly also is a plus. Our fur babies come with us everywhere, so that alleviated so much stress. The decor is retro chic, a mixture of old and modern! Well designed! We loved how comfortable everything was. Great stay!

Great stay! Self check in was very easy and convenient. Very nice house in a nice quiet neighborhood. Location was a plus only 25 minutes from sandusky bay. Would definitely recommend if your going to be staying in the area. Hope to get a chance to return!

We stayed for the weekend because we wanted to go to Cedar Point for the entire day and live four hours away. We had a great stay, all the amenities were provided for, including wood for a fire under the full moon sky.

A large home filled with history and located in a quiet area. Information for the house rules and the area are located in a well-formatted booklet. All of the fans in the house are quiet and help keep the rooms cool along with the air conditioning.

We had a short but enjoyable stay in this somewhat secluded historical home. Plenty of room for a family to bunk, eat and play games, indoor and out. Complimentary coffee "bar" and well stocked kitchen for cooking meals and even soaps and shampoos in batbroom. Great location near major retailers and Ohio attractions (Cedar Point). Check in/out was a breeze. Patrick was friendly and helpful with any questions I had. I recommend.

Very beautiful cottage and area. Plenty of games, books, and activities to do. I was so relieved to find a box charger as I did not have one. The host also goes out of their way to make the stay at a very old cottage comfortable such as AC units, power strips, and plenty of lamps for lighting. I would definitely stay here again, and skip the park so I can enjoy the peaceful area a lot longer!
Patrick’s place was charming, creative and comfortable! Great location to catch up with friends!
It is the perfect place to stay for a group going to cedar point it made our trip so easy with the value and the location!
Great place to relax with family and friends
Patrick’s place was perfect for a little getaway. Really great attention to detail throughout the pad.
Great location, loved the historical home
This was a great, quiet place for what I was looking for our stay. Location was great, and the place was super cute! Thank you!
this is a awesome place

This house was perfect for us! We had a family of 6 and were visiting Cedar Point. It was only about a 20 minute drive to
the park and close to restaurants. Communication was great and we would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Wonderful weekend stay for large group. Kids loved & occupied with all games . Ample space for large group. Very clean , calm surroundings, easy to reach . Amazing place for stay !!

Perfect home for our group. Patrick was an incredibly kind, and gracious host - very accommodating. Great communication throughout and even welcomed us with thoughtful offerings of fruits and flowers at check-in. The house has a lot of charm and history and came equipped with everything we needed. We will definitely be back the next time we are visiting Cedar Point.

My family of 5 (including 3 young kids) had a wonderful stay! We wanted a peaceful weekend to get away with no major plans or busyness around. We loved how the house was decorated and it was very clean. It was fully stocked with everything you’d need for your stay and also had a lot of items that are commonly missed during packing when you go on a trip. The house isn’t too big or too small and was the perfect size for us. Plenty of board games and the giant connect 4 was a big hit with the kids. This house has a far away feel but with grocery and food just down the road. Zero complaints what so ever!

Patrick was beyond accommodating with our travel plans! This is an amazing place for a family trip or anyone looking for a clean, spacious, very cozy home. Secluded property feeling just minutes away from town.
Great plave and a nice,quiet location. You could relax there and make it your vacation just getting away from everything.
A great, quiet and private place! We truly enjoyed our stay.
Probably the best I’ve stayed at!

We had a great time staying here while visiting colossal con. Loved the board where you can change the plastic letters to write a message. All of the details, modern and old combined made this place truly unique.

We enjoyed our stay! We loved the eclectic decor and vintage touches. The house came with plenty of games and seating. You can find almost of all of your kitchen essentials to cook at the house. A great weekend getaway spot.

Patrick's Airbnb is a wonderful tribute to Milan, a marriage of history in this vintage home and modern day vibes.
I felt at home! Cozy touches, quirky decor (love the tiny paintings of snacks!)... it was just perfect for a chill weekend hanging with my cousins. Also, it was located close to Cedar Point, town, food, farmers market, etc. What a great place!
Great host! Cool retro modern feel and an awesome fire pit along with location! Will stay again if available!

Great home! Comfortable beds, plentiful selection of games. Plenty of seating for larger groups. There is a large dinning room table that was a perfect gathering place. Location was great, convenient to Sandusky, Huron and Vermilion. Also Norwalk is about 3 minutes down the road . Patrick is a great host!
This was a great stay while passing through Ohio! It was very comfortable, and we appreciated all the unique touches in the space.
Patrick was a fantastic host! I will definitely return for a weekend in the future!

We had a great stay at this cool house. A lot of great original furnishings. Very comfortable living room area. The games and books were a great addition. Wifi strong. Lots of windows but very private location. We stayed in the downstairs area and very warm during cold days. We still brought warm slippers and cozy lounge wear. Location very close to downtown and restaurants.
Fun historical house.

Patrick was great, very easy to communicate with. The house looks just as the pictures do, great instructions for how to find the house, and a well stocked Airbnb! We will definitely stay again when in town.

Wonderful spot for a weekend getaway. Large house with plenty of areas for different activities. We brought several board games and played on the large dining table. We’re interested in returning with friends for a fun gaming weekend! We stayed during a very cold weekend in February and were comfortable with the heating in our room. Bring cozy slippers to keep your feet warm!

Could not say enough great things about this spot! My partner and I knew nothing about Milan, but the house blew us away. The house truly has everything to make a great trip and made for a great trip!

Lovely, spacious and charming. A surprising amount of room inside the space. Enough heaters to keep it cozy regardless of the temps. Plenty of activities and things to do if the weather isn’t great.
The living space was comfy and allowed us to relax. Massive couch with a heater right overhead.
Bed was gigantic and super comfy. Fresh clean linens and plenty of pillows and blankets.
The house is a perfect mix of modern and vintage touches with a lot of fun attitude mixed in. It was the perfect home away from home for a weekend to recharge.
The house is gorgeous and comfy and we had a wonderful weekend getaway
Very clean, plenty of room, and all the amenities are great. Well kept and very clean place to stay. Check in was a breeze and it was very comfortable and home like
The house was beautiful with thoughtful details and great amenities. Would definitely stay again.

I'm not totally sure where to begin when singing this places praises. It was immaculately clean and exactly at depicted in the photos. The owners even decorated it for the holiday which made it feel just that much more special and comfortable.
It's fun and funky and exceptionally designed with just the right amount of original character. It seemed like every time we turned a corner there was something new and interesting to discover.
Self check in was a breeze. Wi-fi was good and strong. Patrick was a lovely host and very responsive to questions.
The wall heaters worked wonderfully to keep the chilly nights warm and comfortable.
The bedding in the master bedroom (downstairs) was so nice I had to ask about where they got it from.
The bidet (Tushy brand) in the master bathroom was also a lovely little bonus.
The only thing I'm sad about was that we only got to stay for two nights in this magical gem.
If you're thinking about booking it, do it. You won't be disappointed!

I reserved this place when it only had one review and I’m glad I did. The home is exactly as stated and is impeccably decorated down to the smallest details. You can tell the hosts thought of all the details and the home was fully stocked with what we needed so we weren’t left wanting for anything. Patrick is a great communicator and we felt like if we needed anything he was only a message away. The place also felt bigger than in the pictures to us and especially when you’re in the upstairs bedrooms. We visited my family who live in the area and would absolutely stay here again next time.

This was such a great house! The space was very unique, welcoming, and clean and the host was very responsive. Plenty of space for a group and we loved all of the games and puzzles as well. It’s also a super-short drive to downtown Milan, which was perfect. All in all, highly recommend!
Cute and cozy little cottage! We stayed for a weekend for a mini Friendsgiving! Beautiful in the Autumn but did get a little cold upstairs.
Awesome location, fantastic house, great renter. Overall 10/10 trip.
This cottage was a perfect get-a-way from city life!! We had a great girls weekend!! Patrick supplied so many amenities which added a special touch. We will definitely be back again!!
Patrick’s place was great, it was spacious enough for four people to sleep and relax in, had an awesome patio, lots of amenities and was a great location off the highway. Thank you again!

This Airbnb was probably the most beautifully designed space I’ve ever stayed in, to start with. I love the historical meets modern theme, from the old fashioned looking fridge, to the retro acoustic gramophone phone speaker, to the modern bidet in the master bath - I’d say, they thought of everything! I like the graffiti guestbook, such a fun idea! The attention to detail here is spectacular. The beds, pillows & bedding were all very comfortable. My kids loved the game selection so much, that they didn’t even want to go to Cedar Point at first! The kitchen was well stocked, coffee, good creamer, even some food and drinks in the fridge and some snacks! The location is great, feels pretty private and secluded yet really close to everything you need, and not far from Cedar Point (25m). We enjoyed the fire pit outside too! Overall, have to say I loved it. I was starting to get cynical about Airbnbs but this is the kind of place that would make me want to come back again and again and restored my faith in Airbnb! Kind of a hidden gem, I hope it doesn’t get so booked that it won’t be available next time I’m in the area!
We loved staying in this adorable house! It was conveniently located for a visit to both Cedar Point and Oberlin College. The place was clean, cozy, and comfortable.

My fiancée and I have stayed in a number of AirBnbs all over the country, we can honestly say that this has been our favorite. It is extremely comfortable, with the seclusion of a private getaway and all the comforts of home that one might need. The decorations and amenities are a combination of modern innovation and timeless antique. The waterfall shower head is incredible, the master bedroom couldn’t be more comfortable and the privacy/view from the back deck is picturesque. Although there were only two of us, there is plenty of space for larger groups. Patrick was extremely accommodating and available if we were missing anything, which we were not. Just a short drive away is the historic city of Milan. The city square has a number of shops, as well as food and drink options, and the surrounding neighborhoods provided a scenic and relaxing drive. I can’t say enough about the house or our host. Patrick, our biggest regret is only staying 2 nights. We will definitely book again if given the opportunity.
Absloutly loved the place. Check in and check out flexibility made the house a great place to stay.
This place was AMAZING. We will definitely be back. The perfect get away for my boyfriend and I. Very peaceful and relaxing.
Larry’s place was very nice and great for relaxing! We enjoyed grilling out and enjoying the beautiful scenery from the porch!

Great little place! Location is beautiful and peaceful. Lots of wildlife around. Amazing porch overlooking serene lake helps to soak up nature. House is just what it says- tiny, but comfy and well appointed. We loved it!
Couple notes: 1) Air conditioner is right up against the lofted bed. Didn’t bother us but just be aware it will be blowing on anyone sleeping up there 2)Just like the description says, hot water tank is small and runs out quickly but we adapted 3)There are a couple other cabins/houses on the property but are distanced far enough to still feel private and secluded (and it was kind of neat seeing the bon fires from the other houses along with ours at night)

I had a relaxing stay at the tiny house. It was very well appointed. Coffee was available and cold water was waiting in the refrigerator.
Kayaking, fishing (I gave the fish my bait) , walks in the woods, lots of wildlife, wild flowers and places to explore. I built a fire the second night.
What I needed was peace and this placed delivered. Yes, there is a bit of traffic noise but the beauty, comfort and security cancels it out.
I would definitely go back again. I asked if I could live there but Larry said, “Lol…no”. Darn.

My husband and I had a wonderful time! The home was well organized, so it never felt too cramped (especially since we could unpack our bags and store them in the available shed). And the front porch and gravel area were great for having extra space to hang out in and read a book or just sit and look out over the lake. The view in the mornings over the water from the bed were *gorgeous*. And there were a lot of places to explore within reasonable driving distance (we drove to and walked around downtown Norwalk, Huron, Vermillion, Sandusky and Lakeside and found cute shops, good food, friendly people and plenty of piers).
All in all, very peaceful location, felt very private, and had plenty of space considering the size of the home. Would definitely stay again!

Had a great weekend at the tiny house. Everything was slightly nicer than I expected it to be from the photos, including the well equipped kitchen, which was important to us.
The view and immediate area are lovely, though nearby traffic sounds and lawn mowing were nearly nonstop. Not a deal breaker, but a minor irritant.
The hot tub was clean and well maintained, as was the entire structure. Flawless check in as well.
Worth a stay for tiny house enthusiasts looking to get away.
The most peaceful location I’ve ever vacationed. The house was cute and neat. Great outdoors space with great activities to do like hiking, birding, kayaking, hot tubing and bonfires.
We had a great time staying in this tiny home. 10/10 would recommend
Great location, check in and communication was great.
This Stay made my 24th Birthday Unforgettable the pictures does no justice everything about it was perfect! Highly Recommended i'll definitely be back!!

Tiny house overlooking a privately-owned lake. Great space! Came here for the eclipse and left feeling impressed. The house itself has everything you need, we made tacos and a salad. The lake was beautiful, there were kayaks available right by the beach. There are various walking paths around the property. Hot tub was great too.
One note: The house is situated on the same land as one or two other properties, within viewing distance. It didn't really impact my stay, but if you're looking for complete privacy, be sure to ask the host if the other spaces are rented out.
Absolutely loved our stay!
Larry’s place was very clean and secluded, I would recommend to any couples or just friends who need a quiet relaxing private getaway for a day or a week

This place was great!! Looked just like the pictures and is beautiful. Larry gave great instructions to make check in as easy as possible. It is hard to find if you arrive at night but was doable even with pouring rain. Only thing that was not expected was that the tiny house is connected to tanks! So if you take a shower expect to turn the water off every time you can or you’ll end up with an ice cold shower!! Otherwise we had a great time, very peaceful.

I thought the place was beautiful, beautiful weather, had everything we needed. we were scared to kayak but spent half a day doing it because it was so fun. not too far of a walk to the big lake/river. The water was very very cold though. Overall it was very fun 🥲 lots of ladybugs inside the tiny home, and a few bugs but it was a very nice location.
Could not have been more pleased with our stay. Memories to last a lifetime and an unforgettable experience. Can’t wait to come back again!
The place was clean, organized, and cozy. The views were great and the area was peaceful. A great place to spend quality time with your partner!
Perfect place for a little getaway. Not too far away, affordable, and such a nice play.
Absolutely loved staying at the tiny house. It was a little slice of paradise. We didn’t want to leave. We will definitely be back!
Looks just like the photos! A nice place to stay with a great view. Larry provided good instructions on a easy check-in. Everything we needed was provided, would come back again
Amazing and cozy and very clean. Great place to spend some time away. Everything was as expected and user friendly. Would definitely recommend!
Had such a fun time here! The hot tub was very clean and so was everything else! Very secluded and private area. Loved the complementary fire wood!

My girlfriend and I had an amazing time at the tiny home! The place was clean and looked exactly like the pictures, we were far enough from the neighbors that we felt isolated, the hot tub was relaxing and the views were great! Kitchen had everything we needed as well! Larry and Mark went above and beyond to make sure we were taken care of and we couldn’t be more happy with this place! Will definitely be back soon.
Dope . Loved the experience can’t wait to try it out again
Wish we had stayed longer. It was such a beautiful place to disconnect from the world and reconnect w your person. Lovely place to stay.

Larry went to a lot of trouble to recommend area places to eat and shop. We didn’t have time to visit any of them because we were busy in Oberlin for Parents Weekend but they were well described. We did drive through Norwalk and it looked charming. The lake is beautiful. We really didn’t experience all the location has to offer because, like I said, we were mostly out. I’m sure there was plenty to do on the property as well as in town. We did get in the hot tub for a few minutes and it was very relaxing.
awesome experience
Beautiful place, great communication, we had an amazing time!
The place is gorgeous. Perfect couples retreat!

The perfect getaway for my husbands 40th birthday! It was great to disconnect from the world and reconnect with each other. The location is private and beautiful. The place was clean and had all the amenities you could need. Larry was helpful and left tips and directions for everything Will definitely be back!

We were very appreciative to have such a beautiful place to stay during our visit. We were able to get some much needed R&R and re-connect. The property felt like it was miles away but it was just a short drive to everything! We were able to spend hours on the pond and take some great couples pictures on the land. We will be coming back.
It was a wonderful stay! We would absolutely love to go back.
Larry was a great host and the place was incredible. Peaceful, beautiful and exactly as advertised. Would recommend to anyone !

The tiny home was perfect for my husband and I. There was plenty to do and great ways to relax. Between the beautiful lake and the wooded area we saw quite a few wildlife creatures :) The driveway was a little bumpy but not concerning enough to not give a 5star review!

My boyfriend and I had an amazing time together at Larry’s place. My boyfriend enjoyed the kayaking and I enjoyed waking up to the view with my morning coffee. We had fires every night. There is no describing the night skies in this part of Ohio. If you enjoy the stars this is the place to be. We visited Lake Erie and had an amazing time. Larry’s place is truly a hidden gem. The hot tub was so great. We brought a projector and turned the privacy screen into our own outdoor movie theater at night. We were so relaxed at Larry’s. Larry even had an unexpected hiccup the day we were coming and gave us a refund to compensate for the inconvenience and he had it waiting for us when we arrived. We were very impressed.
We had a amazing stay. It was a beautiful place and we hope to come back some day.

Had a wonderful stay. Scenery was superb. Tiny house was very clean. On our first night we had a mama deer and her twin babies pay a visit. So serene and peaceful. Great locations in nearby town for all your needs. Easy check in. Hot tub was wonderful! We want to come back and stay again!
We had a great stay! It was the perfect getaway

We had a wonderful stay this summer on the lake. This is a perfect couples retreat if you like the beautiful outdoors. We enjoyed all the amenities, hot tub, gas grill, fire pit, outdoor seating, the deck with its lighting, and even the kayaks. We were excited to see two families of dear travel through our yard several times, ducks and plenty of fish. The local coffee shop was awesome and downtown area definitely worth a walk. Our hosts were very responsive and accommodating. Thanks so much Larry for the lighter!!
I had an amazing stay with a beautiful view and had a great time kayaking the lake, I will definitely be back.

This Tiny home was great! It was very clean and exactly as described. The surrounding lake and trees were more beautiful than expected. I would’ve not planned anything for my weekend had I realized that we could grill, hot tub, kayak, and swim in the lake all weekend. Would definitely stay again!
Please clean the kitchen and give me a refund

This is a nice 90% modern house but it was VERY NASTY. The kitchen draws were nasty, the bedding was stained and dirty, the bathroom toilet and floor were dirty. The COUCH WAS FILTHY!!!!! It has so many stains I never sat on it. The dining room chairs were equally filthy. This house has a Major ANT PROBLEM. They were everywhere even crawling on us. The walls And baseboards were dirty. There was not any tissue, cleaning supplies or even a mop to actually clean . The living room carpet was so filthy you wouldn't want to walk on it with bare feet. The back yard furniture was FILTY! Someone definitely lives here on a regular basis. We cleaned the place up as much as we could to just feel a little comfortable for the duration of our vacation . This was the dirtiest bnb I have ever stayed in. Modern place but never again will I stay here. The hot water was the best part of the stay. I was accommodated for a partial refund.

Renter beware! We chose to stay here because it was cheaper than getting 2 hotel rooms to accommodate a family of 5 and the pictures and reviews seemed good. I even laughed at some of the "Karen's" that said it wasn't clean enough. I thought to myself, my god... what do they expect?!? Well.... let me tell ya, I should have listened to them!
If you live in a clean house, this is NOT the house for you to rent while on vacation. However, if you live in filth, this might be a step up.
However, if you choose to stay here anyway you may want to take notes...
Bring extra bedding as I cannot guarantee the bedding Steve provides is clean. The comforters are black and appeared to have schmutz on all of them. God only knows what it truly was. But if you have any kind of imagination,
you can also assume the same as I did! The sheets did not appear to be freshly laundered despite there being a washer and dryer right in the kitchen. I would put money on that the previous renters also slept in those same sheets. I was absolutely disgusted by it!
The house itself is dirty. I felt gross being barefoot and my feet were actually getting dirty walking IN THE HOUSE, so in order to keep my feet clean, I had to wear socks.
The tub was clearly not cleaned prior to our arrival, little curlies were left behind.
The kitchen had a nasty stained sponge that I'm assuming was for dishes. I played it safe and used a paper towel. And the window sill in the kichen could have at least been wiped down to get the dead bugs off it!
The window in the upstairs bedroom had a portable AC unit with a cobblejob tube out the window, so no shades or curtain to block the sun.
And we woke up to the smell of the neighbors out back smoking weed.
And for the cherry on top of this monstrosity of a sundae... under the 'Essentials' he states there is a hairdryer in the bathroom. Because this was listed, I did not bring mine. I absolutely have to blow dry my hair and straighten it every morning after the shower. There was no blow dryer and Steve did not reply to my message asking about it. (This one wasn't a huge deal and if the house would have been decent, I would've never even mentioned it)
We left the house cleaner than what he did for us, so hopefully the next renter appreciates it.
